author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored, and created a full sound design for this rare footage of a street scene in Berlin (1945–1948). The video offers a glimpse into daily life in the city during the post-war years, capturing ordinary moments, movements, and interactions that reflect the atmosphere of Berlin at that time.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound design only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

B&W Video Source: US National Archives

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

title: Berlin After WWII (1945–1948) in Color [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
